NDResourceFork(OtherSorces)

A category of the class NDResourceFork.

Extends Class: NDResourceFork
Declared In: NDResourceFork+OtherSorces

Discussion

The category OtherSorces adds method to NDResourceFork for retrieving resource type data from non resource fork sources, at lest not directly. This category can be omitted from your project if the additonal functionalty is not desired.


Methods

+iconFamilyDataForFile:

Gets a files or directories Icon Family Data.

+iconFamilyDataForURL:

Gets a files or directories Icon Family Data.

iconFamilyDataForFile:

Gets a files or directories Icon Family Data. 

+ (NSData *)iconFamilyDataForFile:(NSString *)path;
Parameters
path

The path for which the Icon Family Data is required.

Return Value

A NSData contain the Icon Family Data, returns nil if iconFamilyDataForURL: failed.

Discussion

iconFamilyDataForURL: returns the Icon Family Data for any file or directory. The file does not have to have an actual resource fork with the Icon Family Data in it, neither does a directory have to have an Icon/r file with the Icon Family Data.

iconFamilyDataForURL:

Gets a files or directories Icon Family Data. 

+ (NSData *)iconFamilyDataForURL:(NSURL *)URL;
Parameters
URL

The file url for which the Icon Family Data is required.

Return Value

A NSData contain the Icon Family Data, returns nil if iconFamilyDataForURL: failed.

Discussion

iconFamilyDataForURL: returns the Icon Family Data for any file or directory. The file does not have to have an actual resource fork with the Icon Family Data in it, neither does a directory have to have an Icon/r file with the Icon Family Data.
